title: Replace Hero section image with newly uploaded WhatsApp PNG

requirements.text: Add the newly uploaded image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.png" to `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using a sanitized filename (no spaces/special characters), and update `frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` to use this new asset as the main hero photo (replacing the current `src="/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-v2.dim_1600x2000.jpg"`) while keeping the existing `imageError` fallback behavior intact.

quotes: can you try one last time to see if you can change the hero image to this one i am sending now

acceptanceCriteria: A sanitized copy of the uploaded image exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and is loadable directly via `/assets/generated/<sanitized-filename>.png`.
`frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx` references the new sanitized PNG path for the main hero image instead of `/assets/generated/cute-hero-photo-v2.dim_1600x2000.jpg`.
The hero image renders successfully in the Hero section without triggering the "Photo coming soon" fallback when the asset is present.
If the new hero image fails to load (e.g., missing file), the existing fallback UI still appears as before.

constraints: Do not serve images via the backend; all images must be static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and referenced via `/assets/generated/...`.
Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other `frontend.immutablePaths` entries.
Keep the existing HeroSection fallback behavior (`imageError` state) intact.
nonGoals: Changing any quiz content, quiz images, navigation, or closing section content.
Adding backend logic or data persistence.
